about_the_game:
DLC Pack 1 includes:

24 x Angelfish:
Blueface Angelfish
Emperor Angelfish
Coral Beauty Angelfish
Lemonpeel Angelfish
Masked Angelfish
Emperor Angelfish
Regal Angelfish
Peppermint Angelfish
Bicolor Angelfish
Majestic Angelfish
Bluering Angelfish
King Angelfish
Blue - Striped Angelfish
Queen Angelfish
Potter Angelfish
Flameback Angelfish
Japanese Angelfish
Flame Angelfish
Ballina Angelfish
Semi - Circle Angelfish
Scribbled Angelfish
Clarion Angelfish
Hybrid Paracentropyge Angelfish
Blue - Striped Angelfish

2x Exillas Brevis:

Red Leopard Blenny
Pink Leopard Blenny

1x Filefish

4x Symphosodon:

Red Discus
Yellow Discus
Blue Discus
Plain Discus

Improved fish food that makes them grow 2 times faster
Unlocked Screensaver
Water effect on screen unlocked

name: Virtual Aquarium - DLC Pack 1

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Graphics 4000 or above
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3 GHz Intel i7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660, AMD HD7870, 2 GB VRAM or above

short_description: The DLC Pack is an extension to Virtual Aquarium - Overlay Desktop Game. Includes additional content.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Dutch, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Thai, Turkish, Korean, Romanian
